name: Steazys Skateshop - DEMO
description:
Steazys Skateshop was intended to be one of many demos that would later be used for a bigger and more polished game. 
Unfortunately, I was losing interest in its development. I had already scraped a lot of projects in the past, so I wanted to finish it nonetheless.

This time I am finally able to release a project.

I am aware of many problems the project has, but please leave feedback if you try it and find anything.

Skateboard Model and many Textures are made by Kerim Mušanović
Please check his work. He is an incredible artist.

Controls:
WASD - Navigate
Enter - Submit
F - Sell Board
Backspace - Return
Escape - Pause
